explanation_text:
Sol.
  
The linked list of four nodes will be created.
First node: value = 0
Second node : value = 1
Third node : value = 2
Fourth node : value = 3
The last for loop will print the index number and the values
In the last iteration when index = 3
head = head-> next // typing to access the unknown memory location because the fifth node is not 
there.
Hence the segmentation fault or run time error will come here.
